#summary Completely wipe the datastore

Sometimes when developing a new App Engine, you want to start fresh with the datastore, wiping everything. Unfortunately, this can be a cumbersome process with the existing interface.

*Nuke* is a "add-in" to the admin panel that lets you delete all entities of a _specific kind_, or all entities of _all kinds_ with a button click.

  # Install [http://github.com/arachnid/bulkupdate bulkupdate]
  # Install nuke
    * Checkout from subversion into your application root directory:
{{{
svn checkout http://jobfeed.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/appengine/nuke
}}}
    * Modify your app.yaml to include the following (this also covers part of the *bulkupdate* installation):
{{{
admin_console:
  pages:
  - name: Bulk Update Jobs
    url: /_ah/bulkupdate/admin/

  - name: Nuke
    url: /_ah/nuke/

handlers:
- url: /_ah/queue/deferred
  script: $PYTHON_LIB/google/appengine/ext/deferred/handler.py
  login: admin
  
- url: /_ah/bulkupdate/admin/.*
  script: bulkupdate/handler.py
  login: admin

- url: /_ah/nuke/.*
  script: nuke/nuke.py
  login: admin
}}}
